<< isfield Data structures rmfield >>

namedargs2cell

Converts a struct containing name-value pairs to a cell.

Syntax

ce = namedargs2cell(st)

Input argument

st

a scalar structure.

Output argument

ce

a cell.

Description

ce = namedargs2cell(st) returns an cell containing name-value pairs.

Example

S = struct();
S.CharacterEncoding = 'auto';
S.Timeout = 5;
S.Username = "";
S.logical = false;
R = namedargs2cell(S)

See also

struct2cell, struct, fieldnames.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
